data.eml:eml: A new cryptic species and review of the east-Andean leaf chafer genus Mesomerodon Ohaus, 1905 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Rutelinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seidel, Matthias, Jameson, Mary L., Stone, Rachel L. (2017): A new cryptic species and review of the east-Andean leaf chafer genus Mesomerodon Ohaus, 1905 (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Rutelinae). ZooKeys 671: 61-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.671.11815, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.671.11815
